details.name: ISO 14289-2:202x - 8.9 Annotations - 8.9.4.1 Contents entries - Contents and Alt
details.description: Except Widget annotations, Contents entries in annotation dictionaries shall provide an alternative description of the annotation. If Contents cannot be used for this purpose, an alternate description shall be provided for the annotation via one of the other mechanisms defined in ISO 32000-2:2020, 14.9.3
